trigger_prototype.expression: (({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 & ({Template VmBix VM with wrapper:vm.guest.disk.free.pct[{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_PCT_NOK} & {Template VmBix VM with wrapper:vmbixget.py["vm.guest.disk.free[{HOST.HOST},{#GUESTDISK}]"].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_NOK})) | ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 & ({Template VmBix VM with wrapper:vm.guest.disk.free.pct[{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_PCT_OK} & {Template VmBix VM with wrapper:vmbixget.py["vm.guest.disk.free[{HOST.HOST},{#GUESTDISK}]"].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_OK}))) & {Template VmBix VM with wrapper:vmbixget.py["vm.guest.disk.capacity[{HOST.HOST},{#GUESTDISK}]"].last()}#0
trigger_prototype.name: Low free disk space on {#GUESTDISK}
